name: Monster Metamorphosis
description:
Everyone keeps talking about Metamorphosis. Its when monsterlettes change into monsters. In class, we learned that it's kinda like human puberty. I dont know why everyone makes such a big deal about until...uh oh. 

In this visual novel, you get to hang out with your friends as you experience your own Monster Metamorphosis: A Game about Growing Up! 

Credits:

Game Design/Creative Director/Lead Writer  - undeadDreamer/frayedDreamer

Producer/Art - Chelsea Anglin 

Programming/Engineer - CottonBuds/ Emil John Llanes

Music/Audio Engineer - haberchuck 

Assistant Writer - Oliver Jimenez and Chelsea Anglin
